tableSchema.notes: Data Set with  Voting Records of Greenlandic and Faroese MPs in Folketinget

columns.name: ballot_id
columns.dc:title: Ballot ID
columns.dc:description: ID assigned to the ballot in Folketinget records

columns.name: MP_id
columns.dc:title: MP ID
columns.dc:description: Folketinget ODA ID assigned to the MP..

columns.name: vote_type_id
columns.dc:title: Vote Type ID
columns.dc:description: Folketinget ODA ID assigned to the vote type.

columns.name: vote_id
columns.dc:title: Vote ID
columns.dc:description: Folketinget ODA ID assigned to the vote.

columns.name: ballot_pass
columns.dc:title: Ballot Pass
columns.dc:description: Boolean indicating if the ballot passed.

columns.name: ft_for
columns.dc:title: For Votes
columns.dc:description: Number of votes in favor of the proposal.

columns.name: ft_against
columns.dc:title: Against Votes
columns.dc:description: Number of votes against the proposal.

columns.name: ballot_type_id
columns.dc:title: Ballot Type ID
columns.dc:description: ID assigned to the ballot type.
